entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 19 by morning. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 09 March 2023
